subject: Quick note: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
body:
AI model training is the process of teaching an AI model to perform a specific task by feeding it large amounts of data. 
Model evaluation metrics are quantitative measures used to assess the performance of a machine learning model, such as accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score. 
Evaluating synthetic data requires metrics to assess fidelity and diversity. 
Pearls of Wisdom, a company that generates synthetic data sets for training AI models. 
Synthetic data can overcome data scarcity and bias issues found in real-world data.

Goal: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
